price: អ្នកទាំងនោះស្ថិតលើការចង្អុលបង្ហាញពីម្ចាស់របស់ពួកគេ ហើយអ្នកទាំងនោះគឺជាអ្នកដែលជោគជ័យ។
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدٗى مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: ulāika ʿalā hudan min rabbihim wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
